alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:20PM CDT until June 17 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL YAZOO AND CENTRAL MADISON COUNTIES... At 919 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Canton, moving southeast at 30 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR CANTON. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Sharon around 925 PM CDT. Gluckstadt around 930 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
